content.question: Which of the following aspects of the Fan Shan jade cong from Liangzhu, China, most strongly suggest its use as an object of ritual?

choices.label: The reductive simplicity of its decoration
The highly skilled method of its construction
The scale of the cong and preciousness of its materials
The shape of the cong and iconography of its carving

content.answer: The shape of the cong and iconography of its carving

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
